name: Fruit Galaxy Blaster
description:
Fruit Galaxy blaster

Control the spaceship and collect as many fruits as you can.

to start the game, click on the rocket on the main screen

the main screen also displays the maximum number of destroyed enemies and the amount of fruit that the player has collected (for fruit you can buy attack aircraft, weapons for them and the coloring of attack aircraft).by clicking on the rocket you will be taken to the garage of spaceships.

click on the wrench to select another spaceship, next to the wrench, the cost of one flight on this attack aircraft is displayed. click on the cannon to change the weapon system. next to it there is also a cost for one flight. click on the palette to mark the visual style of the stormtrooper, next to this button is also the price. when you have selected the whole configuration and if you have enough collected fruits, then the right arrow will become active and clicking on it will start a new battle, if you do not have enough fruits, the right arrow will be gray and cannot be pressed, you do not have enough fruits, select another cheaper configuration. note. the very first attack aircraft, with the first armament and the first coloring is completely free, so you can choose it for the first flights.

when the battle started, you only need to control the attack aircraft, it shoots automatically, aim at the enemies to destroy them, hit the apple to collect it, a wrench to restore the strength of the attack aircraft. dodge opponents and their shots as this will damage you and the game will end very quickly. the complexity of the game increases gradually, at the most difficult level it is very difficult to hold out and the player's strength will decrease sharply. In order for the collected fruits to be credited, you need to die.
